metadata.title: CVE-2022-48924 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal: int340x: fix memory leak in int3400_notify()It is easy to hit the below memory leaks in my TigerLake platform:unreferenced object 0xffff927c8b91dbc0 (size 32):  comm "kworker/0:2", pid 112, jiffies 4294893323 (age 83.604s)  hex dump (first 32 bytes):    4e 41 4d 45 3d 49 4e 54 33 34 30 30 20 54 68 65  NAME=INT3400 The    72 6d 61 6c 00 6b 6b 6b 6b 6b 6b 6b 6b 6b 6b a5  rmal.kkkkkkkkkk.  backtrace:    [<ffffffff9c502c3e>] __kmalloc_track_caller+0x2fe/0x4a0    [<ffffffff9c7b7c15>] kvasprintf+0x65/0xd0    [<ffffffff9c7b7d6e>] kasprintf+0x4e/0x70    [<ffffffffc04cb662>] int3400_notify+0x82/0x120 [int3400_thermal]    [<ffffffff9c8b7358>] acpi_ev_notify_dispatch+0x54/0x71    [<ffffffff9c88f1a7>] acpi_os_execute_deferred+0x17/0x30    [<ffffffff9c2c2c0a>] process_one_work+0x21a/0x3f0    [<ffffffff9c2c2e2a>] worker_thread+0x4a/0x3b0    [<ffffffff9c2cb4dd>] kthread+0xfd/0x130    [<ffffffff9c201c1f>] ret_from_fork+0x1f/0x30Fix it by calling kfree() accordingly.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48924` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
